column1: 23087,Astonishing X-Men (2004) #28,28,72589,8,"""GHOST BOX,"" PART 4  Big action. Big Science.  And a Big Mystery to solve!  The superstar team of Warren Ellis and Simone Bianchi take the X-Men on a mission that will take them into mind-bending and previously uncharted territory -- one that will test them -- and their leader Cyclops -- to their very core.
